detail_desc: Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs with patches.
Wrap dress in patterned satin with a V-neck, narrow tie at the waist and buttoned cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings with asymmetric plastic beads at the bottom. Length 5.5 cm.

Slightly shorter top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with a drawstring down each side. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and medium coverage at the back.
Fine-knit cotton jumper in a relaxed fit with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short dolman sleeves, a print motif on the front and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and asymmetric hem at the front.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.

Soft jersey pyjamas with a unique nursing feature. Top with long raglan sleeves, designed with a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Sweatpant bottoms with a wide waistband offering comfortable support, and cuffed hems. The waistband can be folded over post-pregnancy.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.

Short shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and a detachable belt with a buckle.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Triangle bikini top with lined, padded cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Trousers in an airy weave with a high waist, detachable belt with a large, asymmetric metal buckle and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in a stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover front and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with short raglan sleeves with gathers.

Shirt in premium cotton Oxford with a button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with an appliqué and printed details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and tapered legs.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in patterned cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a straight-cut neckline, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Oversized top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pleated jersey hair elastic.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Straight-cut top in a softly draping weave with a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves in a double layer of flounces.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a twisted detail at the front. Lined.
Fitted top in a rib-knit cotton blend with a wide neckline and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.

Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a soft brushed inside and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Small stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a narrow trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.
V-neck dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Capri trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft weave with a lace yoke and button placket. Scalloped lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and side pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gloves knitted in a soft wool blend with ribbing at the cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.

Shirt jacket in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs, welt side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal buckle, elastication at the back, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft pima cotton. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with and elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Sewn-on charm in the shape of a heart (not in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.)
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high, wide, ribbed waist panel. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Biker jacket in soft, supple leather with fixed shoulder tabs and wide notch lapels with decorative metal press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Zipped front pocket, discreet pockets in the side seams and a fake coin pocket with a flap and press-stud at the front. Fixed belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Body in stretch lace with a crocheted look. Jersey-lined cups with a scalloped trim, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length shirt dress in silk with a soft, crêpe finish and a knot detail that adds fullness and structure to the front. Pleats for added width at the back and long sleeves with pleats and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem.
Joggers in soft jersey with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in raw denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly with a button and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Push-up tights that lift and shape with an elasticated waist. 30 denier.
Slides with a fluted rubber sole.
Jumper in a soft viscose-blend knit with a V-neck and inset lace section at the back. Long sleeves with a wide lace edge at the end.
Cold shoulder top in soft printed jersey with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Scarf in a soft cashmere weave with fringes along the short sides.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and long sleeves. Elastication and an embroidered trim at the top and cuffs, and narrow elastication and a frill at the hem.

department_name: Underwear Jersey Fancy inactive from s1
detail_desc: Jersey vest top in soft pima cotton.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a hood, and raw-edge cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut top in a soft, airy, printed viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke.
Boots in soft imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset mesh sections at the hems. Wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets and flap front pockets with a button, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.

Dress in cotton chambray with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and pockets in the side seams. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Detachable imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Unlined.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Hooded top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, lined hood, frill-trimmed kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
